医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
BIOHIT HealthCare 将举办网络研讨会，探讨胃肠道医学中的 TDM BIOHIT HealthCare 很高兴地宣布即将举办题为“炎症性肠病 (IBD) 中主动与反应性治疗药物监测”的网络研讨会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/BIOHIT-HealthCare-to-host-webinar-exploring-TDM-in-胃肠道-medicine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/BIOHIT-HealthCare-to-host-webinar-exploring-TDM-in-胃肠道-medicine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0367adb2-d16f-4a3d-9389-8b8527107915 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 08:15:00 -0400 BIOHIT HealthCare to host webinar exploring TDM in gastrointestinal medicine
偏头痛与肠道健康和慢性非传染性疾病有关吗？偏头痛、肠道健康和慢性非传染性疾病 (CNCD) 之间的联系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Are-migraines-linked-to-gut-health-and-chronic-non-communicable-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Are-migraines-linked-to-gut-health-and-chronic-non-communicable-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22784d2c-f708-4dde-a25c-f9f329791451 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 07:05:00 -0400 Are migraines linked to gut health and chronic non-communicable diseases?
咖啡银皮可以用来预防衰老吗？咖啡银皮提取物（CSE）的抗衰老特性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Can-coffee-silverskin-be-used-to-prevent-aging.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Can-coffee-silverskin-be-used-to-prevent-aging.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1d4d039a-ea83-43de-8258-41d2fc3fd15f Fri, 13 Oct 2023 06:45:00 -0400 Can coffee silverskin be used to prevent aging?
破解密码：最近的发现改变了我们对癌症免疫循环的理解在《免疫》杂志最近发表的一篇综述中，研究人员回顾了肿瘤免疫周期数据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Cracking-the-code-recent-discoveries-transform-our-understanding-of-cancer-immunity-cycle.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231013/Cracking-the-code-recent-discoveries-transform-our-understanding-of-cancer-immunity-cycle.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5417bb4-f5ab-4828-9bba-837901f48fe6 Fri, 13 Oct 2023 04:17:00 -0400 Cracking the code: recent discoveries transform our understanding of cancer-immunity cycle
Moderna 2023 年秋季更新的 COVID-19 疫苗在成本和临床影响方面表现优于其他疫苗Moderna 更新的 mRNA-1273.815 COVID-19 疫苗在减少德国高危人群和老年人的症状病例、住院治疗和死亡方面显示出良好的效果。研究发现该疫苗比不接种疫苗和辉瑞的 XBB.1.5 BNT162b2 疫苗更具成本效益和临床益处。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Modernas-updated-COVID-19-vaccine-for-Autumn-2023-outperforms-in-cost-and-clinical-impact.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Modernas-updated-COVID-19-vaccine-for-Autumn-2023-outperforms-in-cost-and-clinical-impact.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93b74bea-3959-4908-bf22-da9af0619f4f Thu, 12 Oct 2023 23:06:00 -0400 Moderna's updated COVID-19 vaccine for Autumn 2023 outperforms in cost and clinical impact
新研究发现生酮饮食可以减少偏头痛频率和疲劳意大利研究人员发现，生酮饮食不仅可以减少偏头痛的频率和强度，还可以显着缓解患者的疲劳。这项研究为慢性和高频发作性偏头痛患者以饮食为基础的替代疗法打开了新的大门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Ketogenic-diets-found-to-slash-migraine-Frequency-and-fatigue-in-new-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Ketogenic-diets-found-to-slash-migraine-Frequency-and-fatigue-in-new-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7a01978d-06f3-4cb6-9c89-6fde9f5149f5 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 22:52:00 -0400 Ketogenic diets found to slash migraine frequency and fatigue in new study
IL-17：可能彻底改变自身免疫和癌症治疗的分子该研究论文探讨了 IL-17 家族在免疫反应中的多方面作用，涵盖从感染控制到自身免疫性疾病和癌症等病理状况的各个方面。未来的疗法可能会利用 IL-17 独特的信号通路来提供更有针对性和成本效益的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/IL-17-The-molecule-that-c​​ould-revolutionize-autoimmune-and-cancer-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/IL-17-The-molecule-that-c​​ould-revolutionize-autoimmune-and-cancer-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0963000f-db1a-4a8d-a2d9-8ed89c794f95 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 22:37:00 -0400 IL-17: The molecule that could revolutionize autoimmune and cancer treatments
宠物能让你成为更好的人吗？研究探讨了对社会和环境态度的连锁反应最近的一项研究显示，养宠物引发了更广泛的社会和环境问题，从对其他动物和人类更积极的态度到减少肉类消费。研究人员将这种转变归因于对动物的社会认同过程，丰富了人类的道德和观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Can-pets-make-you-a-better- human-Study-explores-the-ripple-effect-on-social-and-environmental-attitudes。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Can-pets-make-you-a-better- human-Study-explores-the-ripple-effect-on-social-and-environmental-attitudes。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=826ff098-4ca7-48fb-97b2-6b316660e987 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 21:47:00 -0400 Can pets make you a better human? Study explores the ripple effect on social and environmental attitudes
研究表明氯胺酮对精神分裂症患者的社会认知具有复杂的影响波恩大学的研究人员深入研究了氯胺酮与精神分裂症社会认知缺陷之间的复杂关系，揭示了既有前景又值得警惕的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Ketamine-shows-complex-influence-on-social-cognition-in-schizophrenia-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Ketamine-shows-complex-influence-on-social-cognition-in-schizophrenia-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=961e5ba6-1df1-4efd-a4a7-59fd3a33f170 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 21:05:00 -0400 Ketamine shows complex influence on social cognition in schizophrenia, study reveals
细胞内旅程：抗抑郁药渗透到细胞、细胞器和膜中神经精神药理学研究人员挑战了关于抗抑郁药作用的传统观点，揭示了影响其有效性的重要细胞内活动。该研究利用先进技术，促使人们重新评估药物靶向和机制，为治疗抑郁症开辟新途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Intracellular-journey-The-penetration-of-antidepressants-into-cells-organelles-and-membranes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231012/Intracellular-journey-The-penetration-of-antidepressants-into-cells-organelles-and-membranes.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7794a71a-145d-433e-8088-3a87602bcc84 Thu, 12 Oct 2023 20:50:00 -0400 Intracellular journey: The penetration of antidepressants into cells, organelles, and membranes
